verses.verse: And they brought <WH935> in the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> and placed <WH3322> it inside <WH8432> the tent <WH168> which <WH834> David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> for it, and they offered <WH7126> burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> and peace <WH8002> offerings <WH8002> before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

When David <WH1732> had finished <WH3615> offering <WH5927> the burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and the peace <WH8002> offerings, <WH8002> he blessed <WH1288> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of the Lord. <WH3068>

And he distributed <WH2505> to everyone <WH3605> of Israel, <WH3478> both <WH4480> man <WH376> and woman, <WH802> to everyone <WH376> a loaf <WH3603> of bread <WH3899> and a portion <WH829> [of meat] and a raisin <WH809> cake. <WH809>

And he appointed <WH5414> some <WH4480> of the Levites <WH3881> [as] ministers <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the Lord, <WH3068> even to celebrate <WH2142> and to thank <WH3034> and praise <WH1984> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478>

Asaph <WH623> the chief, <WH7218> and second <WH4932> to him Zechariah, <WH2148> [then] Jeiel, <WH3262> Shemiramoth, <WH8070> Jehiel, <WH3171> Mattithiah, <WH4993> Eliab, <WH446> Benaiah, <WH1141> Obed-edom, and Jeiel, <WH3262> with musical instruments, <WH3627> harps, <WH5035> lyres; <WH3658> also Asaph <WH623> [played] loud-sounding cymbals, <WH4700>
and Benaiah <WH1141> and Jahaziel <WH3166> the priests <WH3548> [blew] trumpets <WH2689> continually <WH8548> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of God. <WH430>
Then <WH227> on that day <WH3117> David <WH1732> first <WH7218> assigned <WH5414> Asaph <WH623> and his relatives <WH251> to give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord. <WH3068>
Oh give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord, <WH3068> call <WH7121> upon His name; <WH8034> Make <WH3045> known <WH3045> His deeds <WH5949> among the peoples. <WH5971>
Sing <WH7891> to Him, sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Him; Speak <WH7878> of all <WH3605> His wonders. <WH6381>
Glory <WH1984> in His holy <WH6944> name; <WH8034> Let the heart <WH3820> of those who seek <WH1245> the Lord <WH3068> be glad. <WH8055>
Seek <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068> and His strength; <WH5797> Seek <WH1245> His face <WH6440> continually. <WH8548>
Remember <WH2142> His wonderful <WH6381> deeds <WH6381> which <WH834> He has done, <WH6213> His marvels <WH4159> and the judgments <WH4941> from His mouth, <WH6310>
O seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> His servant, <WH5650> Sons <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> His chosen <WH972> ones! <WH972>
He is the Lord <WH3068> our God; <WH430> His judgments <WH4941> are in all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
Remember <WH2142> His covenant <WH1285> forever, <WH5769> The word <WH1697> which He commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations, <WH1755>
[The covenant] which <WH834> He made <WH3772> with Abraham, <WH85> And His oath <WH7621> to Isaac. <WH3327>
He also confirmed <WH5975> it to Jacob <WH3290> for a statute, <WH2706> To Israel <WH3478> as an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285>
Saying, <WH559> "To you I will give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> As the portion <WH9112> of your inheritance. <WH5159>"
When they were only a few <WH4962> in number, <WH4557> Very few, <WH4592> and strangers <WH1481> in it,
And they wandered <WH1980> about from nation <WH1471> to nation, <WH1471> And from [one] kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people, <WH5971>
He permitted <WH5117> no <WH3808> man <WH376> to oppress <WH6231> them, And He reproved <WH3198> kings <WH4428> for their sakes, <WH5921> [saying,]
"Do not touch <WH5060> My anointed <WH4899> ones, <WH4899> And do <WH7489> My prophets <WH5030> no <WH408> harm. <WH7489>"
Sing <WH7891> to the Lord, <WH3068> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> Proclaim <WH1319> good tidings <WH1319> of His salvation <WH3444> from day <WH3117> to day. <WH3117>
Tell <WH5608> of His glory <WH9202> among the nations, <WH1471> His wonderful <WH6381> deeds <WH6381> among all <WH3605> the peoples. <WH5971>
For great <WH1419> is the Lord, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised; <WH1984> He also is to be feared <WH3372> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>
For all <WH3605> the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH5971> are idols, <WH457> But the Lord <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens. <WH8064>
Splendor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926> are before <WH6440> Him, Strength <WH5797> and joy <WH2304> are in His place. <WH4725>
Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord, <WH3068> O families <WH4940> of the peoples, <WH5971> Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord <WH3068> glory <WH9202> and strength. <WH5797>

Ascribe <WH3051> to the Lord <WH3068> the glory <WH9202> due His name; <WH8034> Bring <WH5375> an offering, <WH4503> and come <WH935> before <WH6440> Him; Worship <WH7812> the Lord <WH3068> in holy <WH6944> array. <WH1927>
Tremble <WH9123> before <WH4480> <WH6440> Him, all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> Indeed, <WH637> the world <WH8398> is firmly <WH3559> established, <WH3559> it will not be moved. <WH4131>
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad, <WH8055> and let the earth <WH776> rejoice; <WH1523> And let them say <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> "The Lord <WH3068> reigns. <WH4427>"
Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and all <WH4393> it contains; <WH4393> Let the field <WH7704> exult, <WH5970> and all <WH3605> that is in it.
Then <WH227> the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH9194> will sing <WH7442> for joy <WH7442> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> For He is coming <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth. <WH776>
O give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord, <WH3068> for [He is] good; <WH2896> For His lovingkindness <WH2617> is everlasting. <WH5769>

Then say, <WH559> "Save <WH3467> us, O God <WH430> of our salvation, <WH3468> And gather <WH6908> us and deliver <WH5337> us from the nations, <WH1471> To give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thy holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> And glory <WH9576> in Thy praise. <WH8416>"

Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> From everlasting <WH5769> even to everlasting. <WH5769> Then all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> said, <WH559> "Amen, <WH543>" and praised <WH1984> the Lord. <WH3068>

So he left <WH5800> Asaph <WH623> and his relatives <WH251> there <WH8033> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord, <WH3068> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually, <WH8548> as every day's work <WH1697> required; <WH1697>
and Obed-edom with his <WH68> <WH8346> <WH8083> relatives; <WH251> Obed-edom, also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun, <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> as gatekeepers. <WH7778>

And [he left] Zadok <WH6659> the priest <WH3548> and his relatives <WH251> the priests <WH3548> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the Lord <WH3068> in the high <WH1116> place <WH1116> which <WH834> [was] at Gibeon, <WH1391>

to offer <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offerings <WH5930> to the Lord <WH3068> on the altar <WH4196> of burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening, <WH6153> even according to all <WH3605> that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of the Lord, <WH3068> which <WH834> He commanded <WH6680> Israel. <WH3478>

And with them [were] Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun, <WH3038> and the rest <WH7605> who were chosen, <WH1305> who <WH834> were designated <WH9344> by name, <WH8034> to give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord, <WH3068> because <WH3588> His lovingkindness <WH2617> is everlasting. <WH5769>

And with them [were] Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> [with] trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those who should sound <WH8085> aloud, and [with] instruments <WH3627> [for] the songs <WH7892> of God, <WH430> and the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> for the gate. <WH8179>
Then all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> departed <WH1980> each <WH376> to his house, <WH1004> and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> to bless <WH1288> his household. <WH1004>
